channel.title: Some Help With Forms
channel.description:
I wrote my own form and i was wondering a few things. 1) how do you enter in text in the form, i want to have text that will be on the form but where it will also not have that white box around it. 2) Have the values enetered in the forms saved so the next time the script is opened/ran you will see the old information entered.
Thanxs ~~Pmh~~

thanxs i was searching for them but evidently i was searching for the worng thing because i couldnt find a good one ne where, Thanxs again

I wrote my own form and i was wondering a few things.

  1. how do you enter in text in the form, i want to have text that will be on the form but where it will also not have that white box around it.
